metadata.name: Pearl
metadata.description:
The evening sea calms down, and the moon and stars begin to appear in the rosy sky. A girl of unique beauty comes out of the water. Her hair is an extension of the sea water, her sparkling dress is the glare of the sun on the water. In her hands she holds a sea treasure — a pearl. "It's you," the girl says. "There is exactly the same pearl inside you — astonishing, unique and beautiful. You shine inside and this light is beautiful. Your treasure is always with you, wherever you are.  Remember this, especially in those moments when it seems to you that the sea is stormy".

1/1 digital art by Eiri Tavri
4000*4000px 300 dpi
